sentences.en: a compulsory purchase order
sentences.cn: 强制征购令

sentences.en: a hire purchase agreement
sentences.cn: 分期付款协议

sentences.en: Goods are open to free purchase.
sentences.cn: 自由采购商品.

sentences.en: He gave his sonsome money for the purchase of his school books.
sentences.cn: 他给他儿子一些钱买课本.

sentences.en: I couldn't get any purchase with the screwdriver on the damn screws.
sentences.cn: 我用螺丝刀拧那些该死的螺丝钉时一点也使不上劲儿。

sentences.en: I deem it advisable to purchase the shares in the railway now.
sentences.cn: 我认为现在购买铁路股票是明智的.

sentences.en: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.cn: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.en: I would like to charge this purchase on my charge card.
sentences.cn: 我想从我的信用卡上支付这笔购买费用。

sentences.en: Investors can borrow an amount equal to the property's purchase price.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以获得与房产购买价格相等的借款额。

sentences.en: Purchase tax was not payable on goods for export.
sentences.cn: 出口商品不需要交购买税。

sentences.en: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.cn: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.en: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.cn: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.en: So in this case, we only model browse, select, purchase, and pay.
sentences.cn: 因此，在本例中，我们只为浏览、选择、购买和支付建模。

sentences.en: Some of the receipts had been for the purchase of cars.
sentences.cn: 其中一些收据是购买汽车时开的。

sentences.en: The farm was sold at ten years'purchase.
sentences.cn: 农场以相当于10年间土地收入的价钱售出.

sentences.en: the growing demand to purchase goods on credit
sentences.cn: 不断增长的赊账购物的需求

sentences.en: The purchase price figures out at about two million dollars.
sentences.cn: 交易的价格计算在200万美元左右.

sentences.en: The sales clerk parceled his purchase.
sentences.cn: 售货员把他买的东西打成包裹.

sentences.en: These vouchers are redeemable against any future purchase.
sentences.cn: 这些优惠券将来购物均可使用。

sentences.en: They made the purchase of a car.
sentences.cn: 他们购置了一辆小汽车.

sentences.en: Where did you purchase the car?
sentences.cn: 你在哪里买的车？

sentences.en: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.cn: 你可以在网上买保险。

sentences.en: Your current account is automatically debited with the amount of your purchase.
sentences.cn: 你购物的金额会自动记入账戶借方.

phrases.tran_cn: 路易斯安那购置地；路易斯安纳购买案

trans.tran_en: something you buy, or the act of buying it
